item.title: Contact me
item.description: I am still working on adding all my contacts to this page, but you can see all of my external social media links on my home page.

item.title: Hi I'm Noah
item.description: I’m Noah, an aspiring software developer from Toronto, Canada. I am still working on this site, expect more information soon.

item.title: Still Working on it!
item.description: I am still adding all of my projects to this page. Check back a bit later!

item.title: My Website!
item.description: Hello World! I just created a personal website for myself. This is not the first website I have created (nor is it the last), but I am still quite proud of it. My motivation There are three main reasons why I created this website: I am a relatively young computer enthusiast and I need to prove that I know how to do computer stuff without actually doing too much computer stuff.
